verses.verse: The wilderness <WH4057> and the dry land <WH6723> will be glad. <WH7797> The desert <WH6160> will rejoice <WH1523> and blossom <WH6524> like a rose. <WH2261>

It will blossom <WH6524> abundantly, <WH6524> and rejoice <WH1523> even with joy <WH1525> and singing. <WH7444> Lebanon <WH3844>'s glory <WH3519> Lebanon will be given <WH5414> to it, <WH1926> the excellence of Carmel <WH3760> and Sharon. <WH8289> They will see <WH7200> Yahweh <WH3068>'s glory, <WH3519> the excellence <WH1926> of our God. <WH430>
Strengthen <WH2388> the weak <WH7504> hands, <WH3027> and make firm <WH553> the feeble <WH3782> knees. <WH1290>

Tell <WH559> those who have a fearful <WH4116> heart, <WH3820> "Be strong. <WH2388> Don't <WH3372> be afraid. Behold, <WH430> your God will come <WH935> with vengeance, <WH5359> God <WH430>'s retribution. <WH1576> He will come <WH935> and save you. <WH3467>
Then the eyes <WH5869> of the blind <WH5787> will be opened, <WH6491> and the ears <WH241> of the deaf <WH2795> will be unstopped. <WH6605>

Then the lame <WH6455> man will leap <WH1801> like a deer, <WH354> and the tongue <WH3956> of the mute <WH483> will sing; <WH7442> for waters <WH4325> will break out <WH1234> in the wilderness, <WH4057> and streams <WH5158> in the desert. <WH6160>

The burning sand <WH8273> will become a pool, <WH98> and the thirsty ground <WH6774> springs <WH4002> of water. <WH4325> Grass <WH2682> with reeds <WH7070> and rushes <WH1573> will be in the habitation <WH5116> of jackals, <WH8577> where they lay. <WH7258>

A highway <WH4547> will be there, <WH1870> a road, and it will be called <WH7121> The Holy <WH6944> Way. <WH1870> The unclean <WH2931> shall not pass over <WH5674> it, <WH1980> but it will be for those who walk in the Way. <WH191> Wicked fools will not go there. <WH8582>
No lion <WH738> will be there, <WH6530> nor will any ravenous animal <WH2416> go up <WH5927> on it. <WH4672> They will not be found there; <WH1350> but the redeemed will walk there. <WH1980>

The Yahweh <WH3068>'s ransomed <WH6299> ones will return, <WH7725> and come <WH935> with singing <WH7440> to Zion; <WH6726> and everlasting <WH5769> joy <WH8057> will be on their heads. <WH7218> They will obtain <WH5381> gladness <WH8057> and joy, <WH8342> and sorrow <WH3015> and sighing <WH585> will flee away. <WH5127>"
